name: Gravity Cakes
description:
This game has the sole purpose of throwing me into the base of creating Video Games. I hope you can still have fun with this little project.

Commands:

WASD or Arrow Keys - to move and jump

R - Reset Level

I've been thinking about becoming a game designer for many years but, not having money yet, I finally decided I wanted to at least learn something on my own. I decided to use Construct 2 because I must first understand how to move at the base of the creation of the video game, as well as alone it is difficult to learn C#. I don't use Construct 3 but because for now I don't have the money to buy the license, so I use the Free Version of 2 so I don't have variable limits.

Sorry for my Bad Eng btw!
